title: Extend the UWF registry filter to cover HKCU
body:
Extend the UWF registry filter to cover HKCU so that exclusions can be made to that area of registry so user configurations can be made.
As an admin, we would like to give the user the ability to set their displays and not have the UWF revert them back after each restart. Working with MS support, we were told only way to do this is to be able to add the following registry setting to exclusion list: HKCU\Control Panel\Desktop\PerMonitorSettings, which is not possible.
Thank you for considering this change.
